named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_PHONES_BY_PERSON_ID
named-query.query: SELECT phone FROM com.mpower.domain.Phone phone WHERE phone.person.id = :personId AND phone.inactive = FALSE ORDER BY phone.activationStatus, phone.createDate

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_PHONES_BY_PERSON_ID_ORDER_BY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT phone FROM com.mpower.domain.Phone phone WHERE phone.person.id = :personId AND phone.inactive = FALSE ORDER BY phone.phoneType, phone.activationStatus

named-query.name: SET_EXPIRED_TEMPORARY_PHONES_INACTIVE
named-query.query: UPDATE com.mpower.domain.Phone phone SET phone.inactive = TRUE WHERE phone.activationStatus = 'temporary' AND phone.inactive = FALSE AND phone.temporaryEndDate <= CURRENT_DATE
